web_snippets: Bill Simmons runs The Ringer and serves as Head of Talk for Spotify. He's also the co-creator of 30 for 30, the creator of the Music Box HBO series.
Bill Simmons is the founder and managing director of The Ringer, which he launched in 2016. He hosts 'The Bill Simmons Podcast' and 'The Rewatchables.
